title: cmd/godoc: -sync doesn't work on Windows, also bad documentation
body:
by **trolleriprofessorn**: 
cmd/godoc: /pkg doesn't show changes to dir structure

I haven't found a way to make the godoc server update the /pkg listing
without restarting the server. Please add this functionality (perhaps
with an update button on the web page) or make it more discoverable.

Which revision are you using? 3355c03e3e2c+
